description:
State-of-the-art, slickest cars are waiting to be driven around. It is your job to put them to the test! Car Dealer Driver concentrates on a variety of vehicles sharing one specific characteristic – they are all brand new, fresh from the factory. And you get to take them for a spin first! Check their performance, try them out in multiple scenarios and make sure they are ready to be sold. It’s your job – but why not have some fun while you’re at it?

GAME FEATURES
▶ VARIED VEHICLES: Drive & Park 10 Unique and Different Vehicles
▶ PARKING: Over 50 Precision Driving Missions to Pass!
▶ REALISTIC TRAFFIC: Other drivers to watch out for on the road
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view

Car Dealer Driver features not only fastest, most dynamic sports cars – though they are in high number, of course. But you will also get to drive a dune buggy, an SUV and a beast of a truck. Try out all of the cars yourself and see they’re all pure joy to control!

With multiple scenarios across different maps you will get a chance to try the cars inside the store and outside – on the street. Each level is a different challenge.

When you get outside, you will have to pay good attention to the traffic. Watch other drivers as they go about their business and don't let them interfere with yours!
name: Car Dealer Driver
